Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Best Soloist: Euphonium (Crofton Silver) Youngest Player: Harry Molsen (aged 11) â€” Worsbrough Brass
Horbury Victoria will not be promoted due to rule (f) of the Grading Rules: "In sections where there are ten bands or less on the grading register, only the band or bands with the best aggregate placings over the last three years will be promoted." (Crofton) Only 9 bands competed due to Cornerstone and West Yorkshire Police withdrawing.
March 9, 2015, 5:36 p.m. Sept. 19, 2018, 4:09 p.m.
